input.sentences: the friends join together in one of their homes .
a girl drinks a glass of wine and relaxes .
a whole pizza has been eaten by the friends .
after they have a meal they sit for awhile at the beach .
next is the monument that is right in town .
output.sentences: Carly and Marina woke up and had a quick breakfast, adventure was ahead.
Their friend Reina however, was having a bit of trouble after her night of partying.
They threw some cold pizza at her and all three jumped on their bikes to head to the pier.
Marina took some photos of people enjoying their day at the pier on the way to their final destination.
They made it to the bean and marveled at it's beauty.
